channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: What I Learnt in Staples
item.description: You can only improve yourself through your only effort. Don’t work in an envioronment that you feel yourself not needed. Pick up things quickly and fail fast. Try your best to join a better place, always. You only Live Once. A big name do not mean it is a great name. Don’t blame others, blame yourself when you find you need to be stronger. Always be positive, the opportunities are always more than you think.

item.title: What I Learnt in Verdocs
item.description: If you wanted to find a full time job, do not try finding a internship at first, just go directly to the full time job huntiing. When you try finding an intership, they thought you didn’t have the ability to get a full time job. A small and low-bar company doesn’t deserve your pay off. You can just kill time there and learn new knowledge by the same time. Most of the SDE jobs in US shouldn’t be taken by Chinese students, because their requirement is way lower than who we are.
